title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from Pauline Riggs Noyes Fund
description: Length from a quilt, of white hand-woven cotton resist printed in blue. Design of ascending curving vine with large flower heads and branching foliage; the leaves are deeply indented, with spiny stems.  Lined with bands of white dimity alternating with blue striped cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed on plain weave. Museum purchase from Pauline Riggs Noyes Fund. 1953-176-1.
